resources.string: This sample demonstrates the digital survey. See exp_configuration.json file to find out how digital surveys are defined. Follow the instructions below to launch a digital survey.
1. Launch digital survey sample #1. This sample will auto close the survey completion page (the Thank You page) after 3 seconds.

2. Launch digital survey sample #2. In this sample we will check whether the digital survey is enabled first, then only launch the sample when it is enabled. This sample will not auto close the survey completion page.
